title: Steven Wilson - Hand. Cannot. Erase [Deluxe Edition 2-CD] 2015 a
description:
Wilson's fourth solo album Hand. Cannot. Erase. was released on February 27th, 2015. Hand. Cannot. Erase. received critical acclaim from music critics. The Guardian rated the album five stars and called it "a smart, soulful and immersive work of art".
